Author: jcsxx
Text: Based on personal experience, 4/10 would not recommend. Someone will look through your profile and then suddenly it’s “oh... poor her” “actually she’s obviously anorexic” and “Why would you do that”.  Not fun, but still triggering :\

Author: mossalto
Text: Additional point: there is a distinct chance that unless you use an alt account people will look through your post history and then it'll turn into a whole thing where comments will range from generally insensitive to actively ignorant and mean about your ED. Not to generalise (totally generalising) but you know how people on those other weight-loss subs get...
